title: Clinical Data Exchange Platform
highlights: Designed HL7/FHIR ingestion services for multi-clinic interoperability.
Reduced failed record processing by introducing schema validation and replay queues.
Added observability dashboards for throughput, error rates, and message latency.

title: Model Training & Evaluation Toolkit
highlights: Built reproducible training workflows with experiment metadata tracking.
Automated model comparison reports to speed up iteration decisions.
Packaged evaluation scripts into reusable CLI commands for team use.

title: Agentic Workflow Automator
highlights: Implemented multi-step agent orchestration with guardrails and fallbacks.
Introduced human-in-the-loop checkpoints for sensitive decision stages.
Improved completion accuracy with retrieval and structured output validation.

title: Realtime Event Processor
highlights: Built a goroutine/channel pipeline to process high-volume event streams.
Added backpressure handling to keep memory usage stable during spikes.
Measured end-to-end latency and tuned worker pool behavior.
